name: keyboard-event-to-string
description: Converts a JavaScript keyboard event object into a humanly readable string

scripts.test: TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"lib": ["ES5","ES6", "ES7", "ES2017", "ES2018", "ES2019", "ES2020", "dom"],"experimentalDecorators": true,"emitDecoratorMetadata": true, "target": "es6", "module": "commonjs","moduleResolution": "node","outDir": "./tmp" }' gauge run specs/basic.spec

author: Florian Hartmann
Andrew J Peterson
